# bm-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Html

```html
<form>
  <bm-field label="Slider">
    <bm-slider color="is-primary" step="5" min="10" max="50" value="20" />
  </bm-field>
</form>
```



## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description | Type                                                                       | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`    | `color`     | Color       | `"is-danger" \| "is-info" \| "is-primary" \| "is-success" \| "is-warning"` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | Disabled    | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `isCircle` | `is-circle` | Circle      | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `max`      | `max`       | CSS Classes | `number`                                                                   | `100`       |
| `min`      | `min`       | Min         | `number`                                                                   | `0`         |
| `size`     | `size`      | Size        | `"is-large" \| "is-medium" \| "is-small"`                                  | `undefined` |
| `step`     | `step`      | Step        | `number`                                                                   | `1`         |
| `value`    | `value`     | Value       | `number`                                                                   | `undefined` |
